attributes.action: consider giving Enhanced Rider Scheme status to IAM Motorcyclists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new Enhanced Rider Scheme created by the DVLA is an attempt to provide a nationally recognised standard for advanced motorcycling skills.  It is my belief that The Institute of Advanced Motorists motorcycle test meets this standard, and therefore any Full Member of the IAM Motorcycle section should be able to apply for an Enhanced Rider Scheme Certificate without the need to undergo further training or assessment.
